info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 01 at 2:35PM EDT until August 01 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TUSCOLA COUNTY... At 234 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Kingston, or 8 miles northeast of Mayville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Tuscola County, including the following locations... Wilmot, East Dayton, Deford and Silverwood. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
